keyword: how many calories in a costco hot dog
title: How Many Calories in a Costco Hot Dog?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Costco hot dog, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Costco Hot Dog?
assumptions: Kirkland Signature all-beef frankfurter (113 g) on a steamed bun (50 g), no condiments, ketchup, or added toppings; standard preparation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact size, brand sourcing, preparation, and toppings. Values based on typical Costco serving; check in-store info when available.

quick_answer.text: A Costco hot dog with bun provides ~570 kcal, 22 g protein, and is high in sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add ketchup and mustard (1 tbsp each)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Costco hot dog without the bun?
faqs.a: The all-beef frank alone has about 370 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Approximately 22 g protein per hot dog with bun.

faqs.q: Why is sodium so high in Costco hot dogs?
faqs.a: Due to the beef frank and bun seasoning; about 1520 mg per serving.

faqs.q: Does the Costco hot dog combo include drink calories?
faqs.a: No, the 570 kcal is for the hot dog and bun only; soda adds extra ~150 kcal for 20 oz.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect Costco hot dog calories?
faqs.a: Steamed (standard) keeps it at 570 kcal; grilling or frying may add 20-50 kcal from oil.
